claims.claim: SEON achieved triple growth for three consecutive years
claims.quote: SEON has scaled rapidly for three consecutive years, achieving triple growth each year by building on cloud services offered by AWS

claims.claim: In 2021, SEON more than tripled annual recurring revenue and grew headcount by 4X
claims.quote: In 2021 alone, SEON more than tripled its annual recurring revenue, grew its headcount by 4X, and opened new offices in Austin, Texas and Jakarta, Indonesia

claims.claim: SEON handles real-time transactions for more than 5,000 customers
claims.quote: AWS solutions such as Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2), Amazon Relational Database Service (Amazon RDS), Amazon API Gateway, and AWS Lambda, which allow them to handle real-time transactions for more than 5,000 customers

claims.claim: SEON served over 10,000 requests in the first minute without scalability issues
claims.quote: SEON served over 10,000 requests in the first minute without any scalability issues

claims.claim: SEON maintains 2-3 second response times around the world
claims.quote: By investing in multi-AZ and multi-region architecture, SEON is able to maintain approximately 2–3 second response times around the world

claims.claim: SEON improved database processing time by over 80 percent
claims.quote: the three companies engineered a solution that improved processing time by over 80 percent

claims.claim: SEON reduced data storage costs by 30%
claims.quote: improve near real-time data analytics by 80% and reduce data storage costs by 30%

claims.claim: SEON analyzes tens of millions of customer interactions daily
claims.quote: SEON analyzes tens of millions of customer interactions daily for thousands of customers

claims.claim: SEON closed $80 million Series C funding, bringing total funding to $187 million
claims.quote: SEON, the command center for fraud prevention and AML compliance, today announced the close of its $80 million Series C round of funding... This round brings SEON's total funding to $187 million

claims.claim: Clients achieved up to 90% reductions in fraudulent account creation
claims.quote: Clients have achieved up to 90% reductions in fraudulent account creation

claims.claim: Clients reported more than 80% increase in precision when stopping fraudulent transactions
claims.quote: as well as reporting more than an 80% increase in precision when stopping fraudulent transactions by unifying fraud and AML controls

claims.claim: Clients report up to 75% reduction in manual review time
claims.quote: Clients also report up to a 75% reduction in manual review time, allowing teams to focus on growth and experimentation rather than reactive investigation

claims.claim: SEON can be integrated in as little as a few days
claims.quote: SEON clients can integrate SEON in as little as a few days, not months

claims.claim: SEON serves thousands of customers including leading digital brands
claims.quote: SEON analyzes tens of millions of customer interactions daily for thousands of customers, including many of the world's leading digital brands like Revolut, Plaid, Nubank, Afterpay, Spotify and Entain
